nodes.text: "Path to the Sky" was an Alderaanian ballad. In 40 ABY, the Solo family used the song's first five notes as the doorbell chime for their apartment on the planet of Coruscant.
"Path to the Sky" was briefly mentioned in the first instalment of Star Wars: Legacy of the Force, Legacy of the Force: Betrayal, which was written by Aaron Allston and released in 2006.
